subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}

Phono-semantic compound ([[形聲#Chinese|形聲]]) and ideogrammic compound ([[會意#Chinese|會意]]): semantic [[人#Chinese|人]] (“person”) + phonetic [[火#Chinese|火]]/ semantic [[火#Chinese|火]].
